content: poke-ball hat by stellasknits materials red white and black worsted weight yarn i used red heart soft size 5us 3 75mm circular needles size 7us 4 5mm circular needles size 7us 4 5mm double pointed needles dpns tapestry needle © stellasknits 2016 abbreviations dpn double pointed needles k knit p purl st stitches r row kfb knit in front and back of stitch to create 2 stitches this hat is designed to fit from approximately age 8 or so through small adult let s begin cast on 88 stitches on size 5us 3 75mm circular needles with white yarn begin k2p2 ribbing for about 1 2 54cm or as long as you want the ribbing switch to size 7us circular needles and continue to knit until entire piece is 2-1/2 6 35cm from cast on edge cut white yarn continue knitting with black yarn for 1 2 54cm cut black yarn continue knitting with red yarn until entire piece is 6-1/2 16 5cm from cast on edge decreases r1 k9 k2tog r2 and all even row knit r3 k8 k2tog r5 k7 k2tog r7 k6 k2tog r9 k5 k2tog r11 k4 k2 decrease r13 k3 k2 decrease © stellasknits 2016 r15 k2 k2 decrease r17 k1 k2 decrease r19 k2tog around cut yarn leaving a tail to thread through the remaining stitches pull to tighten and secure underneath make the pokeball with two size 7us dpns and white yarn co3 r1 kfb every stitch 6 st join these 6 stitches in the round with your dpns r2 kfb every stitch 12 st r3 k1 kfb repeat around 18 st r4 k2 kfb repeat around r5 k3 kfb repeat around r6 k4 kfb repeat around change yarn color to black r7 k5 kfb repeat around r8 knit around r9 k6 kfb repeat around r10 knit around bind off loosely you may want to go up a needle size on the bind off to make sure it s loose leaving a long tail for sewing you can adjust the size of the pokeball by making less white rounds and omitting the last 2 black rounds just use your judgement on how big you want the ball to be make up center the pokeball over the black stripe and using your tapestry needle attach it to the hat securely © stellasknits 2016
